sentences.sentence: The reproductive endocrinologist or embryologist will discuss this with the patient prior to the transfer.
sentences.translation: 移植前生殖内分泌学家或胚胎学家会和患者讨论这个问题。

sentences.sentence: Ms Jaclyn Friedman, a clinical embryologist at Reproductive Biology Associates, Atlanta, Georgia, USA, undertook an on-line survey looking at attitudes towards IVF around the world.
sentences.translation: 美国佐治亚州亚特兰大生殖生物学联合公司的临床胚胎学家，Ms Jaclyn Friedman进行了一项全球对体外受精的态度的在线调查。
